Posts.Content: Apr 10, 2008 07:47AM dpt wrote: Hi Sabz, Reading your story felt like it was mine....same age...same breast..same problems..I hope you are doing fine. My doctor diagnosed this condition of mine with costochondritis..which is  the inflammation of the cartilage near the chest wall.Do a lot of stretching exercises.It's a very common problem. Please write how are you feeling now.I'll be relieved. I am also from India.
